title.en: A Prayer to the Garland of Successive Rebirths

text.en: Emaho!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: Radiating from the sugata-essence, like the illusory reflection of the moon in water,
text.en-trans: deshek nyingpö ngang dang chudé gar

text.en: You arose through various means as a splendour for the teachings and beings.
text.en-trans: natsok tab kyi ten drö pal sharwa

text.en: In Śākyamuni's presence, you were the nun Utpali,
text.en-trans: tubpé chen ngar gelong utpal ma

text.en: At Bodhgayā, the Vajra Seat, you were Rolang Derolma,
text.en-trans: dorjé den du rolang dé rol ma

text.en: Cared for by Padma, you were Shelkar Shiwatso,
text.en-trans: pemé jezung shel kar zhiwa tso

text.en: Vairotsana granted you blessings, ripening empowerments and liberating instructions.
text.en-trans: bairo tsa né jinlab mindrol dzé

text.en: You saw Tārā face to face and received the supreme attainment.
text.en-trans: drolmé zhalzik chok gi ngödrub nyé

text.en: In Khotan, you were Changchub Chödrön Palmo,
text.en-trans: liyul changchub chö drön palmo dang

text.en: In the Nelmo valley, you were Kunga Buma,
text.en-trans: nelmo shö du künga bum ma dang

text.en: In Tsang valley, most recently, you were renowned as Tamdrin Wangmo,1
text.en-trans: tsang rong nyechar tamdrin wangmor drak

text.en: In Central Tibet you are Sukhavajra Tsal,
text.en-trans: böyul ü su sukha benza tsal

text.en: And in future, in Dongchu, you will be Dewé Jungné—
text.en-trans: ma ong dong chur dewé jungné zhé

text.en: To you in these, your successive lives, I pray!
text.en-trans: ku treng rimpar gyüpar solwa deb

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, so that from this moment on, until I attain awakening,
text.en-trans: deng né zung té jisi changchub bar

text.en: I may never part from you, O noble yoginī,
text.en-trans: jetsün naljor khyé dang mindral zhing

text.en: And I may enjoy the splendid nectar of your profound teachings,
text.en-trans: zab chö dütsi pal la longchö ching

text.en: Without gradually progressing through the stages and paths,
text.en-trans: sa dang lam drö rimpar mi töpar

text.en: I may realize the intent of the clear light Great Perfection,
text.en-trans: ösal dzogchen gongpa ngöngyur ching

text.en: Perfect the practice of Tögal's four visions,
text.en-trans: tögal nang zhi nyamlen tarchin né

text.en: And accomplish the rainbow body dharmakāya!
text.en-trans: jalü chöku drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: May I and those who are connected to me—all sentient beings—
text.en-trans: dak dang dak la drel tok semchen kün

text.en: Seize the stronghold of the non-abiding dharmakāya!
text.en-trans: mi né chökü tensi zinpar shok
